explanation: [0-0] In front of a green lawn, there are three bottles of cola: a transparent Sprite, a black Pepsi, and a yellow Fanta.
[0-2] Then a hand puts a string of white candy into the transparent Sprite, and many bubbles appear in the Sprite.
[0-2] Then a hand puts a string of white candy into the transparent Sprite, and many bubbles appear in the Sprite.
[2-5] Next, a hand puts a string of white candy into the black Pepsi, and many bubbles appear in the Pepsi. Then a hand throws a string of white candy from above the yellow Fanta to the ground.
[2-5] Next, a hand puts a string of white candy into the black Pepsi, and many bubbles appear in the Pepsi. Then a hand throws a string of white candy from above the yellow Fanta to the ground.
[2-5] Next, a hand puts a string of white candy into the black Pepsi, and many bubbles appear in the Pepsi. Then a hand throws a string of white candy from above the yellow Fanta to the ground.
[5-7] Then a hand puts a string of white candy into the yellow Fanta.
